content.detailedDescription: I was coming from the store it was around 2:40 cst and i had the urge to look up at the stars.  the first thing i noticed is that there were alot of visible stars that night...Were in the city we shouldnt see so many of them.  then suddenly i look to the horizon and see a "star" flashin green, blue white red...I suddenly think its a plane or it could be the helipad at the hospital which is in that direction. we eliminate the plane as the object is hovering and slowly gaining altitude. we also eliminate the helipad as the helipad does not flash green.  i then ask my cousin to view the object and it starts saying its a plane its a plane its a plane and as soon as he said it it started showing more colors.  the colors were purple, pink, white, red, blue, green, magenta, yellow,  it was a awesome display of colors.  by my knowledge and location i believe the object was towards lake michigan hopefully some other people viewed this object and caught it on tape.  the object staying hovering for awhile i went inside and the object was still there.
content.summary: Multi-colored ball of light hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was moving plants on deck as cold was expected overnight.Noticed 2 then also a third light about a hand width above the treetop line in the e/se sky.They were larger than a starpoint of light,smaller than jupiter looks with naked eye.Not sharply defined with an edge so i call them orblike lights.Seemed a bit orange in color.We are very used to seeing aircraft lights and the stars in our sky area and have a very good view of them as we are away from city lights and have a great dark background for them.These lights were clearly not aircraft or common stars and bright and unusual enough to grab my attention.My thought was that i was seeing something very much out of the ordinary that i wanted to try to identify.  i grabbed my panasonic lumix dcm-f18 and got 4 photos.1 pic each of two of the lights, and 2 pics of the third light.Do not know for sure what order or which are the pair.Was rushing and pretty much going on autopilot for pics and was getting them in frame and holding the camera on them to focus. looking at this page as a clock face 1st was at 1 oclock a 2nd at 7:30 and a 3rd at a point halfway between the center point and 6 oclock.The light at 7:30 was close to a hand width above the treetop line with the others progressively higher and spreading up and to the right.They were stationary and did not move around the sky.They may have moved slightly in their part of the sky if at all but i was really too busy to stop and evaluate dead still or not.I just got the photos and the lights went out pretty much at the same time as one another but there may have been a slight stagger. again i was not able to take in every detail of this aspect as i was focusing on the camera and a little bit flustered as well. but the lights did seem to just go out like you would turn off a lamp and they did this closely in time.I was excited to see these lights and be able to take photos of them.I put the camera in review mode and was hardly able to see more than a tiny bit of image/light in all the black background.But by clicking up the mag function i saw some strange stuff.Got even better when i loaded the memory card into the laptop with a bigger screen.I wondered if anyone else had seen this display and decided to call the local tv station wwmtv in kalamazoo.I spoke with the weather guy and he said it could be a couple of things weather related and agreed to look at the photos.He mailed me back and said he eliminated the possible causes he had initially thought of and said he had never seen anything like this before.He asked if the objects were moving or still and i told him what i have stated here.We talked about there seeming to be shape/structure in the images. i am hoping to hear from him again to see if he can share any info that might shed light on this event. my memory of mufon from a tv program led me to this site.I will try to attach photos.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs,e/se sky,fairly stationary.Took pictures.Lights went out

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting is my first, and i am not sure if there has ever been such an event reported anywhere before, both in intensity and in duration of observation. thus, the detail of the sighting.
 
on 10th of august me and a friend of mine went camping in the central part of the stara planina mountain, a mountain that divides bulgaria in the middle, starting from west and ending near the black sea to the east. the exact place where we had the sighting is in the central part of stara 
planina, right where the troyan-kurnare passage road lies, which is one of the main passages connecting the northern and southern parts of bulgaria. at the highest point of that passage there (1565 meters above sea level) is a big monument from the communism times before 1989 in bulgaria, it is called beklemeto. the closest town is troyan, from the northern side, it's about 15 kilometers from beklemeto. also, close to the monument, around 30 minutes on foot from our camp there is a small group of hotels.

i met my friend up in the mountain, he came from southern bulgaria, and i travelled from the capitol city sofia to the place from the northern side of the mountain. we met there at around 12 o'clock at noon, then we walked a few of kilometers from beklemeto taking a dirt road towards east (we had no vehicle, we both travelled by hitch-hiking) and after awhile we reached a good place for camping (it's quite windy because we were on the highest point of the mountain in the region and strong winds are not something rare there). the exact coordinates of where we put our tent are:  42���46'20.73"n  24���39'7.46"e facing north-east, the view is towards the northern part of bulgaria (i got the exact coordinates thanks to google earth). also there were no trees on our altitude, forests were lower than us, the closest being about a kilometer away.

the weather was changing really fast during the day, first it was sunny, then clouds appeared at our altitude and covered everything from sight. at a certain point i started having a terrible headache and went to sleep 
for a few hours, i woke up at around 10:30 pm. i went out of the tent, me and my friend sat and talked for about an hour. the fog of clouds from earlier was now completely gone and as it was new moon, we could observe a breath-taking view of the milky way and also the perseida meteor showers which was originally the idea of our trip to the mountains. 

at around 11:30 pm i looked to the north and suddenly noticed some sort of a light source far away (probably 5-7 kms away from us) but yet, on the same altitude as we were. i instantly yelled to my friend "look!" and as 
we observed the light flying really slowly without changing direction we started guessing what it could be. the light wasn't flashing at first, it also didn't make any sudden changes in direction the first five minutes or so. not until it decided to suddenly change its direction to the exactly opposite. some seconds after that, really close to the first object, another one appeared from nothing and both started an amazing series of flashing (which i guess was how they communicated) and flying in the sky. 

and i'm talking about some serious mind blowing manouvers, that i personally can't assign to any known (or even kept as a secret) human aircraft or natural phenomenon.

that's when we realised something out of the ordinary was happening. the lights were making sudden changes of direction, sometimes they faded away for a couple of seconds, just to get brighter afterwards, it was more than obvious they were communicating to each other. and then we started looking at various regions of the night sky to look for more objects and it didn't take more than a minute - that's when we realised it - these objects were all over the place, they just didn't caught our attention at first. we have no idea how many we've observed throughout the night, however, at a certain moment we managed to count 25 different objects being present at the same time on the night sky. all of them were behaving as nothing known to or being produced by man. we didn't manage to see more details regarding these particular lights, as they were some kilometers away from us, and were simply everywhere we looked.After probably an hour of observation of these lights, we saw something that gave us a chill to the bone. we looked to the east and that's when we saw just above the closest hill, really close to the ground, a white light hovering over what appeared at first 10-15 meters above the surface of the hill. in the beginning we could only see that light, however, after thirty or so seconds of staring we could very well distinguish its shape - it was flat disc shaped, it had a bright constant light in its center (the one that caught our attention at first), around the edge of the disc there was a ring of red light, slowly pulsating (it was much dimmer than the central light), and because there was no moonlight, we couldn't see the body of the craft in detail, however, when looking carefully, we could depict the flat and round shape of the object by being much darker than the sky behind it. the most interesting thing about this particular object was the way it was moving - first of all, when realising the object was disc-shaped, we understood that the lowest part of it actually was no higher than 2-3 meters from the top of the hill it was hovering above. that's because the position of the disc was not horizontal, as in most cases, but it was vertical according to the ground. the most amazing part about it was that while moving horizontally over the hill, the object was slowly rotating having it's center being the center of the rotation, and it wasn't rotating in one specific direction only, but it was changing the direction constantly.

this was the time when we decided we should try and make contact. i took the flashlight and started flashing towards the large disc. it completely stopped moving for more than a minute, hanging over the hill. then, it just
continued hovering, and not more than 2 minutes later, something flickering in the top of my eyesight caught my attention. it was a small white light looking almost like a star, but it continued getting brighter and brighter. the light was constant, not flashing, only slowly getting brighter and larger and then again to its original state. also, from time to time every 10-15 seconds it vibrated very strangely - it rapidly moved from left to right for a tiny fraction of the second. the distance between the most left and most right points of its movement when it vibrated was around 4-5 centimeters in my eyesight, so, taking in consideration it was away from us for some distance (although we can't be exact as only a light was visible and no obvious body of a craft) it moved amazingly rapidly... and this is the only object we managed to get on photo - both me and my friend only had telephones with weak cameras and only because of its brightness did it came visible on the photo, unlike the other dimmer lights in the sky.

a little bit later, we saw a second easily distinguishable in shape and design object. first, it appeared as a small, pale dot, that was right above the disc shaped. my assumption is that it was at least a kilometer above the disc. it was really strange, as this pale red dot copied perfectly the movement of the disc on the horizontal, it seemed as if it was one whole object. it continued doing so for about 10 minutes, when it suddenly stopped (while the disc just continued whatever it was doing over the hill), hung in the night sky for some seconds, and then started moving. it flew directly west, meaning it actually passed right in front of us, not more than 200 meters away, at about 45 degrees according to our point of view just to disappear in the distance. as it passed, we could very well see that it was a flat triangular shape, with a bright white light at its center, and three red lights in the angles. again, it wasn't as typical sightings describe these as horizontally positioned, this one was vertical and was flying in horizontal direction meaning it had no problem at all with the forces of air resistance. the greatest thing about this object is that we could really clearly see a very specific characteristic about its way of movement - on equal intervals (i measured them to be around 5 seconds) the triangle simply rotated on 90 degrees around its center, changing the positions only of its angles, as the center light being stationary, and this rotation occured just in the matter of tenth of a second, continuesly, as the object was flying away from us until it disappeared.

the last object that was showing specific characteristics and was visible enough to make out details, was at almost our altitude. it appeared at around 4:00-4:30. it looked like a disc again, but we couldn't make out a body of the craft, so we're not completely sure. what we could see were 5 lights (not separate, definately connected to each other making one whole object). they were one next to another, and made the object appear as horizontally positioned. what was kind of scary was that it was hovering right above the hotels i mentioned in the beginning, but we didn't see something more than that.

it all ended at around 5:30 am in the morning, when out of nowhere, clouds appeared and again covered everything. we went in the tent and at that time with the fog outside, although we were very scared, we somehow fell asleep. we slept until 7 o'clock, and when we got up, there was no sign of the objects.

none of the objects produced any kind of sound. completely silent! neither me, nor my friend felt anything strange during the sighting, except for the adreanaline rush the first 2-3 hours, we wanting so much to communicate with them, shouting from time to time in excitement, yet baffled what on earth were these things, considering and discussing the possibility they were man-made, what they were doing there etc. after we calmed down little by little, we started thinking rationally, and i personally got scared because i didn't know what their intentions were, and i trully felt the harsh reality of me and my friend being all alone there in the mountain, in front of our tent surrounded by tens of these lights. a smashing feeling, that is, of being so ridiculously small and defenseless.
on 11th of august in the morning when we woke up, everything has changed, i was so stressed from the experience that i didn't want to talk about it for at least a week. i only told the people closest to me with very little detail, at first. we didn't even feel an urge to go to the hill the disc shaped object was hovering above to see if there were any signs left. all i was thinking about is how i was going to get home and not go outside for awhile.

also, another important detail is that the whole mountain was echoing of shepperd dogs barking.

don't get me wrong, i've been wondering about ufos and et life for some time, much before this event happened. i was an enthusiast who up to that point had no personal experience on the topic, only observations and theories. and being as open-minded as i consider myself to be, i have no idea why this has stressed me so much, all i know that my view of everything has become completely different since then. it took me 2 months to fully overcome the stress from the event and to gather will to sit down and make this story reach other people. also, since then, i haven't felt any need to convince anyone who has heard and not believed this story and i still don't. from what i saw i simply believe we're not that far from the moment this phenomenon will become publically acknowledged by everyone. something i think is important as well - after a week passed after the event and i started doing research, i found out that every fifth citizen of troyan claims to have seen such lights in the distance towards the peaks of the mountain.

note regarding the photos - i'm uploading three photos, two are originals and the third is the one of the two photos but after some enhancing a friend of mine did on it. bear in mind that this is a photo taken by a phone camera towards the night sky - it was new moon and the whole milky way was visible, and yet no stars appeared on the original photo, well, not until it was edited and brightened. the reason for me to say this is to take in consideration that fact, because it will help when trying to find out how much brighter the object was in the sky than the stars. as for the reddish areas that appear on the enhanced photo, some of these are most likely camera artifacts, and the small dots of light are showing exactly how the phone camera managed to photograph the stars in the night sky in comparison to the bright object.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: More than 25 different objects observed by two people for six hours during the night of 10th to 11th of august 2010

content.detailedDescription: I wrote a detailed report but it was lost when i tried to submit. i cant type that much again. moved in from east(lehigh acres), moved toward naples, than back towards its original path, then to west, then blinded by camera screen. moved inhumanly fast and its movement was defined. clean cut fast movement.
content.summary: Fast moving object came in from east, made, triangular sweep pattern, lost object when blinded by phones camera display screen.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work i work at a gated community in fort myers florida for a tree serive i was going around the left side of the neighbors house and i looked up and i saw what at first i thaught was an airplane intill i relized it didnt make any sound or have any wings..It was cigar shaped and a pale white with what seemed to be black windows on the right side of the craft..It was fairly low to the groun few thousdan feet maybe and flew slow, slower than an airplane landing...I looked off to my right to see an airplane comming in and i looked back at the craft and as i did it vanished and my boss walks over and i just look at him then the sky and spoke jibberish lol and then he said what did u see a ufo? lol yep i did...3 days b4 i saw a tear drop shaped silver craft also so i thaught it was the coolest thing in the world and that noone would believe me but id love to see it again and closer
content.summary: Whiteish color with what looked like black windows

content.detailedDescription:
Missed a call on my phone from a friend who had just left our place a little less than an hour before. he called at exactly 7:07 pm central time. i returned the call around 7:13 pm and he was super excited. he saw a picture that we took almost 2 years ago today of three strange objects in the western horizon and because of what just happened to him, he called me. he had been driving north back to the dallas area and was just south of corsicana on i-45 when he observed a huge object in the sky heading west...He said it was amazing. he called me to see if i could see it from here but i was not near the phone.
when i called him back, he told me what he was seeing and i ran outside to see if i could see anything. the sun was setting in the west and i scanned the horizon, i suddenly spotted two metalic shiny thin shapes suspended above the horizon (almost exactly like the sighting we reported 2 years ago and took pictures). they were above the tree line but below the jet fly over area along i-45 or beyond (near hwy 84). they were in almost a v like formation. i told my friend that i was seeing two objects and he reported that he could see them too, even though he was now in corsicana looking back toward the south west.
i yelled for my fiance to come out of the house and grab the camera (we live on a farm)..He didn't hear me so i ran back in through the front door. he was in the kitchen so i told him to run out onto the back porch to see for himself...I grabbed my digital camera and ran out too. 
they were gone. i had hung up with my friend when i ran inside the house. i called him back and he couldn't see them any longer either.
on interesting note: two years ago when i snapped a picture of the three contrail shiny pencil objects suspended in the western sky (in almost the exact location), the objects that appeared in the picture looked like perfectly round metallic balls (not anything like we had seen with the naked eye).
content.summary: Shiny reflective long objects (2) suspended on western horizon, looked like solid contrails but solid

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the kitchen, clearing off some dishes, when my dad comes in from the side door of our house, urging us to come outside, thinking it was just an animal in the street, until my dad tells me to look to the sky, i look, and he starts explaining he saw something similar to a comet, before i have time to take it all in, i see for myself; three glowing lights hovering/flying in unison.

toward the western sky is where i saw it, it appeared to be flying west

at first i thought it was a squad of fighter jets, because we live close to fort bliss, and that's commonplace around here, but soon my doubts were silenced when i saw the three lights starting to hover around a central point. i ran inside, to get my mom to come outside and see for herself, when i came back outside it had moved further into the horizon, and a fourth light had appeared above the triangle of lights in the center, forming a pyramid-like structure, and i had to climb onto my dad's unused car. i urged my parents to do the same so we could see it as well. we just stood there starting at it, it continued to move slowly to the west, constantly rotating as it moved.

that was when my dad said he wished we had a camera, so i quickly jumped off the car and ran inside to grab my digital camera, i ran back outside, but realized i could get a better view from the roof, so i ran to out backyard and struggled to get our ladder set up, i dropped it once before i got help from my dad and we set it up, he climbed up first, and i followed, but when we got up there, it was gone. no trace of it was left, it just disappeared from the sky. it couldn't have flown further away, because at the speed it was already going, it would have been in our view for another 10-20 minutes. with it still fresh in my mind, i decided to sketch what i saw to the best of my ability, i went back inside and started to sketch what i saw, and notify any of my friends in the area through a social networking site to see if they had seen the same thing.
content.summary: Pyramid-like structure of lights, slowly hovering and rotating

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so i was playing a game of halo reach in my living room. my couch is perpendicular to a patio door facing east. i live on the last floor of my four story apartment building. i have a pretty good view of the sky, but there's many other same size apartment blocking it. lets say that about half of my field of view is blocked. i can't recall the exact time but i know that the sun wasn't down yet. it was around 5:50 pm (the sun went down at 6:03 pm here on that day). the weather is a clear blue sky with a bit of cloud, but mostly on the horizon.

so there i am, relaxing after school, playing a bit of halo and speaking with buddies on my microphone. in between two games, i turn my head toward my windowed door, and i see this star-like white with a very faint blue/purple toward the outline on the top of farthest building. if i can compared the color of it to something i know, i could say that it looked like magnesium burning. for its initial position, if east is noon, and the limit of my field of view is 9 o'clock on my left and 4 o'clock on my right, it was approximately at 11 o'clock. seamed bigger and brighter than your regular stars. when i see things in the sky that i'm not to sure of, i try to look at it and a inert object (the white frame of my door in this case) and stay still, to determine if it's moving or not. my conclusion at that time: i'm looking at a ufo slowly moving north (toward 4 o'clock). 

a bit exited about this, i get up, open my door and take my head a bit outside to see the stars i normally see at this hour are there. everything seams to be in place. so after i opened the door, look at the sky and look back at the object and i see that it's still bright but slowly dimming and accelerating. no erratic movement up and down, it's simply staying at the same altitude and traveling in a linear fashion toward north. i didn't get the feeling it was getting closer or farther of me. at the moment the light dimmed to about half of the initial size, i start to see a flashing light behind it. it seamed like the initial light was the headlight of the ufo and this new flashing light was the tail light. the head light had the same initial color (less brighter) and the tail light was white. the tail light blinked a bit like a normal airplane, but the frequency was a bit wrong. i couldn't make out any solid in between the lights 

this flashing tail light really confused me. i said, at that time, to my buddy: "it's maybe a airplane" and he's like "yeah your right you were overreacting at first, it's a plane"... of course he was skeptical. i could say that the rest of the sighting was it simply going is way, accelerating and still dimming its light (like if it was going through a cloud, but there's no cloud) until i lost sight of it behind a building. the final position of the object was about 10 o'clock, using the clock system i described earlier. the overall speed of this ufo was a bit slower than airplane at first, but was definitely faster than a conventional airplane at the end. 

after the sighting, i said to my buddy: "yeah maybe it's a top secret military airplane, but i never saw a airplane with headlights this bright"... now, when i think about it, there's no ambiguity, it was a ufo (extraterrestrial or not).

this sighting hasn't surprised me. disclosure is near. this isn't my first encounter with ufo, but it's my first sighting report to mufon. why bother submitting it? because i think that october 13 2010 was a special day.
content.summary: Morphing  bright moving star-like

content.detailedDescription: I want someone, anyone to explain to me what is flying around the top of the moon. when i took these photos which are exactly 7minutes 7seconds apart i noticed through my viewfinder a dark silhouette at the top of moon image.  i kept zooming in and out and snapping photos of the moon and stars, and 7 minutes 7seconds later this thing is on the other side of the moon and at a different angle. nobody wants to tell me whats going on. i have approximately 50 count um 50 strange photos and videos that i can't explain. i go out in my back yard and take photos at night and get these strange circular images that appear to have eyes or at least what looks like eyes. i'm tired, don't get much sleep and everyone in my family and at work thinks i'm crazy. maybe i am. or maybe i'm just paranoid, at any rate i don't think that i can project my psychosis onto a photo or video. i don't think that mufon can help me get to the bottom of this. but i am still trying to solicit their help. i could be reading more into these photos or videos. hold on for a few minutes a military helicopter flyihg over my house.  that never happen before! copter flying just above my house pausing, now taking off heading west. i thought that just maybe they might be out to take a look. you see all the photos that i have submitted are real and so are the ones i haven't. every since i was approached by one of these things i wanted to tell everyone that someone or something is here that hadn't revealed itself before. i have shown you all a few of these in hopes that you will realize that these creatures are indeed here. i have seen a few of them up close and they appear to be pure energy, but the energy is contained in a transparent sleeve or shell.  i don't know what to make of them, so hopefully there is someone out there that has seen (truly seen) what i have and then figure out how to alert other. when you download these photo zoom in on the top left and top right and then ask yourself why is it there?
content.summary: Moon photos

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on cobb prky going nw. in the sky were what appeared to be six strobe lights. one was about a mile away from the others. then you had 3 that made a triangular shape another a few feet away from the nose point of the triangle and then one just above tree level. they were strobing in red, green, and amber lights. they were stationary for a good 30 min. i was on my way to dinner. by the time we came back out from dinner about 45min later the lights were gone. i tried to take a picture with my camera phone but they were to far away.
content.summary: Bright  strobe like lights red, green, and amber

content.detailedDescription:
I reside in a small town in florida near a nuclear plant and an air reserve / airforce base called homestead. i am a retired army infantryman, and a state law enforcement officer. today at approximately 2012 hundred hours i came outside my home to have a realaxing cup of coffee on my back yard pool deck, when i glimps up onto the sky i noticed a star-like object moving from east to south west in an approximately 45 degree angle. as this object moved it was slowing down and a small tail started to form. it came so low that the object looked bigger as it was decending. at this point i said to my wife "look honey is a shooting star"; when she looked up she said honey shooting stars fall thats going up. at this point i looked up along with my wife and observed how the shooting star look alike object had no more the meteor look alike tail, instead it was a big ball of white light moving upward back into space. the event took approximately 10 to 12 seconds. i was stunt when i saw this event but i was even more concenrned when i heard 2 military jets motors been scrambled. i waited for a few more seconds and whent and picked up from my room a pair of 50x100 binaculars and followed the fly by area that the f-18 flew, and for my surprise they climbed from the east toward the same area and altitude the star-like object was seen by me and my wife.

i have seen numerous aircrafts during my time in the military and civilian life but i have never seen anything that could possibly enter our atmostphere and return back out without leaving some kind of visible smoke trail or sound. i am concern about what is lurking in our aereospace as the no fly zone are both combine more than 30 miles. fifteen miles no fly zone at the nuclear plant at turkey point and another fifteen on the adjacent air reserve/ air force base to their north. that includes our neighborhood which is approximately 7 miles away west of the base and 13 miles west north west of turkey point nuclear plant. i have made some calls but the air reserve base will not comment nor the nuclear plant would not answer their phone. anyone cares to provide any answer, please be my guess.
content.summary: Star-like object was observed entering atmostphere hover and returned out of atmostphere over an area of no fly zone as per nrc and usaf.

content.detailedDescription: Between 8:30 and 9:00 p.M. on wednesday, october 13, 2010, i had taken the dog to the backyard so he could relieve himself.  i often stand on the deck in the center of the yard and gaze up at the stars at such times.  i noticed a dim light in the sky to the east-northeast, moving a bit fast.  i thought it was a meteorite, but as i watched, it seemed to change course and ���fly��� horizontally.  as the light approached, it appeared to have a definitive shape, sort of like a wedge or boomerang.  the entire object seemed to glow with a faint reddish-orange light, and there appeared to be rows of slightly brighter lights underneath it.  from my perspective, it would have been approximately half an inch wide.  i heard no engine or wind noise.  the object passed overhead and continued on a straight path toward the west-southwest.  from the moment i first spotted it to the moment it disappeared from sight, about eight seconds passed.
content.summary: Wedge-shaped glowing object flies swiftly and silently over san francisco east bay town.

content.detailedDescription: While i was on a smoke break at work i looked up in the sky and noticed what looked like a very bright star, but it was bright and sunny and about 1 in the afternoon. i watched as it moved slowly to the south and then stopped. that's when it really had my attention. it then started to move slowly west and it stopped again. it looked to be extremely high in altitude (above the altitude jets fly at.). while i was watching, another one came from the south at very high speed. i would say it was at least ten times faster than a military jet. the one from the south kept going until it was out of sight in the north. shortly after that, the one i was originally watching faded until i couldn't see it anymore. (by the way, during this time i had ran inside and found the number to a local news station <kwtv> and told them to go outside and point their cameras up and told them what i was seeing.) i then went inside and went back to work. a little while later i came out and saw it again, brighter than before, and almost directly over me. it was still way up there. shortly thereafter it took off to the north at high speed and split into 3 pieces and disappeared. i went home and turned on the news but they didn't have anything about it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While i was watching one ufo moving and stopping others would fly past at high speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a bright light when i was showing my son where jupiter was, i watched it because it was brighter than any lights i have seen in the sky before.  i watched it for a minute as it was moving east to north and it stopped by the hills.  i pointed it our to everyone around and it stayed in one spot for at least 10 minutes.  we were leaving a friends house so when we left i drove in the direction i was seeing the lights and when we go there i got out my video camera and taped what we saw.  it is ok video but we could see it our selves better than the video shows.  i don't have a clue what it is and it is very bright.
content.summary: Ufo seen and caught on video

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a walk in my neighborhood last evening when i noticed a strange looking flying thing near the moon.  it grabbed my attention because although it flew like an airplane, it didn't look or sound like one.  

it was becoming dark outside, but still light when i had the sighting.  the sun might have just set or was about to.  i was walking in a southerly direction and the moon was in front of me to my left.  the object was flying from south to north but was also to my left, east of me.  it was up in the air at approximately a 45 degree angle.  it was approximately 2 inches long.  

it could have been an airplane that i witnessed.  it flew in a straight trajectory like one.  however, it didn't have wings that i could see.  it didn't make noise.  it didn't make a vapor trail.  it didn't look like a plane.  it looked like a flying horizontal tube.  it lit up as a bright orange object, but that could have been the setting sun reflecting off of it.  hard to say.  i watched it for a minute or so before it disappeared into the distance to the north of me.  i tried to take a picture with my cell phone, but because my phone doesn't zoom, i couldn't really get a good shot.  

the way the light came off of it, it kind of looked like the object might have had three sections to it -- a front, a middle and a back section.  

i looked in the sky on my way home and noticed a few airplanes.  some were very distant and some were lower to the ground.  none of them looked like the orange tube.  the one airplane that i saw at approximately the same altitude definitely made a lot of noise.  

seeing the object felt exciting, but i wish it could have been just a little closer to the ground so i could have had an even better view of it.  i would have liked to have gotten a good photo.
content.summary: Reflective tube like orange ufo in topeka, ks

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to the back yard noticed how pretty the sky was because between the ground and middle part of the sky was clear then it turned to line of flat cloud cover toward top of sky with pink color in the clouds. looked toward logansport and noticed that above the tree line of the woods across the field where it was clear sky was what i can only describe as a fireball without the fire. looked like the white trail that a jet leaves behind but only this was extremely large at the front and tappered of toward the back. i would say it was like a comet without fire. it was moving in a straight line toward the north. i first thought it was a jet as they leave the white trail behind them but this was way to large and was not leaving a trail behind it. i told my 13 year old daughter to look and she said i see it then walked away.
  i watched it for about 2 more minutes then went in to get my husband and camera. i went back outside and was in the house for about one minute or less and came back out and it was gone.
content.summary: Long fireball without the fire that was large at the begining and tapered off toward the end.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my chair that faces the front door to only look up and see  a very strange silver object, it looked round and it was moving but by the time i jumped up to open the door and go outside it had disappeared in the blink of an eye.
content.summary: A very strange silver object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from houston tx. on my way to houma la. while i was driving east on highway 90 i noticed a rectangular shaped cloud moving across the sky in a sort of jerking motion. the reason it caught my attention was because it was the only thing moving in the sky.Iwatched the cloud until it went into another cloud bank.A few seconds later this object appeared. it looked like a long white tube it came towards the road,when it got close to the road it made an immediate 180 degree turn and stopped. it did not have the shape of a blimp.It looked to have the shape of a long cylinder,it had no means of steering,meaning nothin visible protruding from either end there was nothing such as a wheelhouse.The only thing i remember is that were a row of windows that ran the intire lenght of it. i unfortunatly did not have camera with me all of this took place as i was driving.At the time this happened i thought that vice president cheney was somewhere in louisiana hunting so i thought it could have been some sort of a protection for him. iknow other people must have seen the same thing i did.Ihave never seen anything like this and i may never have this priveledge again thank you for your time.
content.summary: Came from clouds and parked

content.detailedDescription: I am a 37 yr old male in paulding county ga. i was in the air force for 7yrs. me and my girlfriend were star gazing because we woke up early and i figured i could see the comet hartley. it was around 5:30 am.  i noticed some odd lights moving very very fast. they were flying from north to south.  they were silent and looked lower than normal aircraft. you could see the stars between them, they were shaped like an advil gel capsule but bronze in color.  they were flying in perfect sequence.
content.summary: 3 egg shaped bronze lights in triangle form

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was sitting on the step facing the western sky , talking on my cell phone ,when suddenly a yellow huge objecct appeared instantly, hovered for about 3 minutes and then her call dropped so she looked at the phone and back and it had dissappeared
content.summary: Midnight on 10/12/2010 saw objrt in western sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at the fashion square mall around christmas time with my wife, my 4 month old son and my coworker. we were getting into our car to go home when i happened to look up and right above the parking garage i saw this orange color egg shaped object with these blue lights moving around it. at first i thought it was a remote control toy,being so close to the holiday. i realised that it wasnt because it was pretty sizable and moving slow. i called out to my wife and coworker but by the time they looked it was already gone. it wasnt even dark at the time so i always wondered if anyone else saw this thing. anyway for years i thought i was going crazy because no one believed me. then about 6-7 years later,my wife friend was over at our home and she said she was driving downtown orlando the other night. she said she saw a flying object as she was driving home. she couldnt believe it because no one on the road seem to notice it. i then told her about my encounter i had 6-7 years earlier,as i described the object i saw her jaw just hit the ground. it was the exact object i saw those many years ago.
content.summary: Orange color with moving blue lights

content.detailedDescription:
Just stepped outside for a smoke. right away, i saw 2 orange colored spherical objects flying side by side. the only sounds i could hear came from the compressor station down the road. at first sight, i would estimate the size of them to be about the size of a small baby pea, although i have no idea how far away from me they were. they were gliding slowly, like they were in no hurry, to the west of me. they were heading in a westerly direction. there are trees all around where i live and i had to move a few times to keep them from becoming obscured by the branches in the taller trees. i watched them as they continued to get smaller and farther away, then i ran inside to email my friend who saw one a few days ago. i would have called her but its late and i know her husband has to work in the morning and didnt want to wake him. she lives 80 miles west of me and they are headed right for her! 
i'm guessing she is already in bed, too, as if she were up and on the computer, my phone would have rung by now.

after sending my initial report, i went back outside to see if i might get to see anything else. 
the only thing i saw this time was a plane flying in the exact same direction as the 2 orange objects. i watched the plane until it went out of sight. the plane was much higher in the sky than the 2 orange "orbs" as it never even got near the tops of the trees and i didnt have to move to keep sight of it. i would say that the plane was flying faster than the 2 objects i saw because it flew out of my range of vision faster than the the the 2 "orbs" did.
content.summary: 2 orange objects flying low and slow and silent

content.detailedDescription:
Weather or other phenom over plymouth, mn, oct 14, 2010 at 8:43 drifting north to south, hazy line in soft focus, white, no color, fog-like stream, like a contrail, or an irregular colorless rainbow, changed shape.  it had a vertical line of same material dropping from the bottom which followed along with the larger shape.  on our deck, we are directly perpendicular to a bright star and the line passed in front of the star.  it disappeared onto the horizon within about 15 minutes.  called kare 11 news to see if a meteorologist was available, but no weather people were there.  tried to photograph on several settings, but couldn't get an image.  drew simple renditions which we will scan and submit tomorow.  likely weather related, but witnesses hadn't seen anything similar before. 

in retrospect, noticed no airplane activity which is unusual, because msp airport frequently flies airplanes on approach or take off over the house.  first airplane noticed was at approximately 9:15.
content.summary: Weather or other phenom, foggy arc moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at work at the california state board of equalization headquarters in downtown sacramento on 5th and n streets on a cigarette break when i first witnessed the objects. it was about 3:20pm when i noticed it, not long after i got outside to smoke. i remember hearing about the manhattan ufo sightings from the day before, and as someone who is curious about the ufo phenomena i decided to look up into the sky. the object looked like a white/orange star hovering next to the wells fargo center building across the street on n street, the tallest building in sacramento. it appeared to hover there, like a star would, but then i noticed that it was moving, very, very slowly down as if towards the horizon. it wasnt a star because it didnt move from east to west. it was to the north-west, slightly more west. at first i didn't know what it was, though i immediately assumed that it was not an airplane. there were no contrails, not exhaust, and was small enough that i it was a plane i would definitely see contrails. it moved too slow to be a high elevation plane. i am very familiar with aircraft. i build scale model airplanes and am an amature aircraft identifier. i use a jane's modern aircraft identification, military and civil book. it was unlike any aircraft. simply like a star. it ever so slightly moved, i noticed, straight down as if towards the horizon, like an aircraft moving away from you. there were very thin, slightly puffy clouds out that moved to the east. it began to slowly move into the path of one and i thought i would lose it behind the cloud. however, once it crossed the cloud's path i could still see it clearly. i then assumed it was below the clouds. i watched to for several more minutes when it came into the path of a tree. i walked a bit down the block to a clearing and saw the object there with another, exactly like it; a white/orange star. the second object was below it an slightly to the left. the two objects did not move at this time. they hovered there for a moment. then, they began to move together towards the sky, as if moving straight up, still very, very slowly, as if they were hovering. i asked some other boe employees if they could see it, but they all ignored me except for a young lady who said she couldn't see it though i pointed right at it. she thought i was crazy. i then noticed that i was out there for 20 minutes, which is over the 15 minutes allotted for my break. i didn't want to go back upstairs, partly because i was fascinated, and because my office faces the south. i was so angry with myself for leaving my iphone upstairs at my desk, because i wanted to take a picture of it. i came back downstairs about 45 minutes later and tried to find them but the objects were gone. after work i immediately rode my bike to the sacramento river levee where there is a clear, 360 degree view of the sky, but could not see anything but planes taking off and landing at the airport and some birds. when i came home i called the local news channel, kcra 3 news and asked if anyone had reported a ufo sighting. they told me no and told me they were not interested in a ufo story. during and after the event, i felt a strong sence of fear, joy, confusion and curiosity. mostly confusion and fear. my muscles were shaking and could not get the thought of the objects out of my head. i was not very productive the next hour and a half at work. i still have feelings of fear now and chills go down my spine thinking about it. curiously, i had a dream about seeing a ufo the night before, and when i woke up i noticed that my watch, which is analogue and tells you the day and the date was incorrect. i compulsively check my watch, and it did read thursday, but instead of the 14th it read the 15th. it read wednesday the 13th the day before. i don't know if it is a sign of something or it was just some kind of funky mix up with my watch and coincidence i dreamt about a ufo. i am still frightened and confused and have this strange compulsion to look up onto the sky to the north-west. i cannot explain what it was, or why no one else noticed it. it was so clearly visible. it was real.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two white/orange objects moving very, very slowly, almost hovering.

content.detailedDescription: While standing on the front porch my son(michael) and his girlfriend(stephanie) saw movement in the sky, at which point they called me to see it and what i saw was: at arms length the object was about 2 fingers wide and it was traveling at a slow to moderate rate of speed.. the object had a transparant glow to it which had about 8 lights on it that were very dim. it looked like a boomerang and was traveling north to south. my son saw it at about 12:00 in the sky and he said it was much larger (about 4-5 fingers wide at arms length). i saw it at about 2:00 in the sky and it was about 2 fingers wide. we watched it until it dissappeared  near ballground, georgia. it made no sound at all.
content.summary: Ufo was traveling north to south over jasper, georgia

content.detailedDescription:
I heard of the events set to happen on october 13, 2010, and decided to do a google video search upon my return home from work. i found news footage of the sighting in ny and decided to dig deeper. around 10:15 pm i found a youtube video recording of a live webcam (http://www.Earthcam.Com/usa/newyork/midtown/?Cam=empiresouth#) that captured the ufos flying over south manhattan.

i clicked the link provided and waited. when my boyfriend and brother came home, i told them about the video and when i switched tabs to the live webcam, bright yellowish/orange orbs appeared. they assumed various formations in non-conventional air traffic patterns. they changed brightness, size and position for nearly an hour. i don't have video capture software but did take screenshots via the "grab" application on my mac. it was certainly the most interesting thing i have ever seen. we were all baffled, but excited at what we were witnessing. i grew up a us air force brat and have seen many many flights while living on military installations throughout my dad's career ... but never anything like this! 

my screenshots are attached. i took 12 screenshots throughout the sighting, but will post the most significant three. below is the video that led me to the webcam.

youtube video titled: nyc ufo's via webcam 2010/10/13 10:00 pm
posted by user: areca81
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lrtvlqpzkzm
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufos seen on live webcam!!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on four lane hwy 171 to deridder from leesville. i was going to work as a rn at the hospital. across the road on the north lane side over a field at the rosepine research station (an agricultural station) i saw a shiny red sphere hovering motionlessly in the air just above the tree tops and powerlines. i thought, what is this? i slowed my vehicle down. i turned in the median to get to the other side for a better look. i was curious i did not know what it could be. i stopped my vehicle and put it in park preparing to exit and examine this thing. i got the impression it saw me looking at it because as i was looking at it with my keys in my hand it suddenly changed from red to a silvery white color and zipped off very quickly and quietly. i have never seen a thing that could hover, change colors or move this fast. i thought it was fascinating and wanted to be able to study it further. had it the intent or capability it could have got me. i was more curious than fearful at the time.
content.summary: Shiny red like auto paint turns to silver/white sphere around 10-12' diameter

content.detailedDescription: Iu was walking my dog at 7:28 pm tonite i saw one object moving ...... south western on maybe a 55 degree elevation ,guestimation,. the object was visible several seconds i have been in communication with *(name deleted--cms/sg) i called him was telling him i've had another sighting ,when i saw two more they were stationary and started moving slowly in opposit directions one moved off south western like the first one... the the other two moved in sync with eachother 2nd one was traveling east/south eastern the other was also they were about a twofoot apart from eachother and they were evenly spaced apart like a sighting i had last friday 6 days ago.I just get the feeling to look sometimes ,and they are there.I think atotal of 4 ,but possibly one mayhave reversed course and joined the others the two did not move until the other was in a triangle formation then the others moved from a stationary  hover,, the whole time i had awitness,*(name deleted--cms/sg) head investigator of this chapter of this site. the event lasted a total of about 5 minutes......  my watch was dead i had to tap it to make it work again,weird.I replaced battery a few months ago/lithium battery,and i didnt know it wasnt working until several minutes later. the light or  glow was maybe a white yellow red hue to it. never blicked or strobed and was up very high they have to be above atmosphere ,i just feel thats accurate they resemble stars the others were in perfect camoflauge not moving obvious extra terrestrials in my opinion,and would challange those who would try to dismiss it as conventional aircraft. erratic darting and curving to right slightly in a lateral line acroos the horizion sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: erratic moving  objects  in  night sky in different moving directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw big contrail, so big i got out got my camera and zoomed up to full 12 x
all i could see was the trail not the jet as i watched in the finder a
luminous ball crossed in front of the jet at twice it's speed.
*(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
see for yourself. have another video over dfw airport to show.
content.summary: Conflict with jet fighter

content.detailedDescription: I saw it out my dining room window from my house and noticed it by chance.I then got in my truck and drove down river road to see if i could get a better look. at first it appeared like it was cylindrical and had chem trails that a jet would have.As it moved closer to the earth the object turned into more of a ball of fire.When i was further down river road towards knowles atomic power lab a jet took off from schenectady air force base and headed towards it. after that i lost sight of it behind the tree line.I was surprised to know hear or see anything in the news or paper because this thing was big.
content.summary: Falling object which appeared as a plane and then more of a fireball as it neared earth.
